intro: Bimfli and his travels in time is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect.
description:
In this chapter, Bimfli will travel to different times in Japan. He will meet several allies throughout his adventure: a priestess concerned about the town, a samurai protector of a great castle, an enigmatic geisha, etc. All of these companions will teach Bimfli an important lesson about the balance between development and nature.

·Easy gameplay designed for kids.

·Entertaining children's story that is easy to read. 

·Learn to read with fun stories in English. 

·Upbeat ambient music and sounds based on the culture of each country. 

·Learn about monuments, cities, civilizations, geography and architecture. 

·Educational content on art history with the recreation of the best painters and architects of each era. 

·Learn about the world's major capitals, as they were in ancient times. 

·Adjust accessibility settings such as font height, sound volume, and image transition speed. 

·Promote diversity and discover multicultural traditions, exploring the world with Bimfli.
